name: A Spring's Journey
description:
A pen has lost its spring! Reunite, spring-style in this 3D platformer with a unique movement system!

"Really clever; very well made" - Alexander Paschall

Sproing your way to the top to reunite with the pen you came from!

With `*~optional star collectibles~*`.

!! Must be played with an analog controller, like an xbox360 controller !!

This game has no sound, and was made for ue4jam, Spring 2017.
